pages.text: 7|179|Ara amara to bahu jina o manabake jahannamera jan'ya srsti karechi [2]; tadera hrdaya ache kintu ta dbara tara upalabdhi kare na, tadera cokha ache ta dbara tara dekhe na ebam tadera kana ache ta dbara tara sune na; tara catuspada jantura mata, baram tara ceye'o besi bibhranta. Tara'i hacche gaphela [3].

7|180|Ara allahara jan'ya'i rayeche sundara sundara nama. Ata'eba tomara tamke sesaba name'i daka [1]; ara yara tamra nama bikrta kare taderake barjana kara [2]; tadera krtakarmera phala acire'i taderake deya habe.
7|181|Ara yaderake amara srsti karechi tadera madhye ekadala loka ache yara n'yayabhabe patha dekhaya [1] o se anuyayi'i (bicare) inasapha kare.
7|182|Ara yara amadera nidarsanasamuhe mithyaropa kareche, acire'i amara taderake emanabhabe dhire dhire dhbansera dike niye yaba ye, tara janate'o parabe na [1].
7|183|Ara ami taderake samaya diye thaki; niscaya amara kausala atyanta balistha.
7|184|Tara ki citta kare na ye, tadera sathi mote'i unmada nana [1]; tini to eka spasta satarkakari.

7|185|Tara ki laksya kare na, asamanasamuha o yaminera sarbabhauma kartrtba samparke ebam allaha ya kichu srsti karechena tara samparke? [1] Ara era samparke'o ye, sambhabata tadera nirdharita samaya nikate ese giyeche, kaje'i erapara tara ara kon‌ kathaya imana anabe
7|186|allah‌ yaderake bipathagami karena tadera kono pathapradarsaka ne'i. Ara tini taderake tadera abadhyataya udabhrantera mata ghure berate dena [1].

7|187|Tara apanake kiyamata samparke jijnesa kare (bale) ‘ta kakhana ghatabe? [1] Baluna, ‘e bisayera jnana sudhu amara rabera'i nikata. Sudhu tini'i yathasamaye setara prakasa ghatabena; asamanasamuha o yamine seta bhari bisaya [2]. Hathat kare'i ta tomadera upara asabe [3].’ Apani e bisaye sabisesa jnani mane kare tara apanake prasna kare. Baluna, ‘e bisaye jnana sudhu allah‌ra'i nikata, kintu adhikansa loka jane na [4].
